[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Chrom attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, untap each attacking creature you control, after this phase, there is an additional combat phase. This ability only triggers once each turn.
[i]Promote[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, if you dealt combat damage to each of your opponents this turn, transform Chrom.
